title: EU slaps Apple with 1.8-bln-euro antitrust fine
text: Hi, what are you looking for? Apple was fined for the alleged abuse of its dominant market position in the distribution of music streaming apps to iPhone and iPad users via its App Store, according to a statement from the European Commission.
